name: DeleteDashboardFromList
description:
Remove dashboards from a specified list in Datadog.

Use this tool to delete one or more dashboards from an existing dashboard list in Datadog by specifying the list ID.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the dashboard list from which dashboards will be deleted.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to delete items from.

parameters.name: dashboards_to_delete
parameters.description: A JSON array of dashboards to delete, each with an ID and type. The dashboard type can be 'custom_timeboard', 'custom_screenboard', 'integration_screenboard', 'integration_timeboard', or 'host_timeboard'.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to delete from the dashboard list.

value_schema.description: Dashboards to delete from the dashboard list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: dashboard_list_id
parameters.description: ID of the dashboard list to delete items from.

value_schema.description: ID of the dashboard list to delete items from.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Dashboards to delete from the dashboard list.

dashboards.description: List of dashboards to delete from the dashboard list.

value_schema.description: Dashboards to delete from the dashboard list.
